title: Poppy's Crit animation is a massive headbutt
body: Time to build crit Poppy and headbutt the shit out of people

replies.body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=voXhLliLbkc

Only if it is Noxus Poppy.

{{champion:83}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:2}}
Let the head-banging commence!

-cues up the Disturbed/Avenged Sevenfold/Red/Skillet/Nirvana/Breaking Benjamin/insert metal or rock band of choice here-

IT'S TIME TO {{champion:54}} (cause he's a rock?)
The others I understand, but how does ANYONE headbang to Nirvana or Breaking Benjamin?
It depends on the song.

just play crit maokai?
ADC Maokai OP
I've seen you play that, and it hasn't been successful.

{{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3094}} {{item:1326}}

{{champion:78}}  Catch me if you can.

ie+shiv+PD+reaver = 100% crit
the fire cannon is useless, and it sucks on melees too
Depends on what you're aiming for. Take out Phantom Dancer and Fire Cannon combined with Static Shiv really hurts when you poke people with your passive.

It gives you more on hit damage, and works great with the shield throw.

Also lots of speed.

So this is prequel Poppy?  Smashing her sexy new face into Nautilus' body probably lead to her being butt fugly.
why not just be amu then. every aa is a headbutt with no crit required.
Crit Poppy = godmumu
